entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A few clouds. High minus 25.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Ice fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
